Tyrael raised a feathered eyebrow.

Tyrael: That is acceptable. They could accept. Speaking of Magnus, he
entered my ship during the battle to contact Rodimus. He seemed to
panig at the idea you were coming, General. Would you have any idea of
why he was so frantic?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Blacheart smiles. "The old phrase, keep your friends close, and your
enemies 
> even closer. I do not see a treaty now, Magnus had told them about the 
> conquering of cybertron...if they didnt know that....it is too late
for what 
> ifs. We will have to try a cease fire instead."
